message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I believe you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1650000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1700000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am now proposing $1675000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking $1725000 is a fair price for this product. It's a compromise that I'm comfortable with.

Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to consider $1700000 as a final offer for the product. This is the maximum I can afford while still staying within my budget constraints.
